title: Passionate-Starred Lovers
description: This romantic tale is about Aurora and Viviane. They were two lovers who were sharing their lives together. The couple went on a beautiful romance together where their lives intertwined. They shared their lives and all of their experiences together. The lovers embraced life and their future that they had together. They took everything as it came at them together. This was an epic love story that shook and moved both of their lives for the better. This is about a marriage between two lovers. This is a story of an enduring love between two lesbians.
author: Courtney Asunmaa
